43 class Nasa7DB : public NasaDB<Nasa7Polynomial>
44 {
45 public:
46  Nasa7DB(int arg)
47  { }
48 
49 protected:
53  std::string filename() const {
54  return std::string("nasa7.dat");
55  }
56 
61  void skipHeader(std::ifstream& is) const
62  {
63  std::string line;
64  while (std::getline(is, line))
65  if (line.substr(0,6) == "THERMO") break;
66  std::getline(is, line);
67  }
68 
72  Species loadSpecies(std::ifstream& is) const
73  {
74  std::string line;
75  if (!std::getline(is, line) || line.substr(0,3) == "END")
76  return Species();
77 
78  // Species name
79  std::string name = Utilities::String::trim(line.substr(0,18));
80 
81  // Phase
82  PhaseType phase;
83  switch (line[44]) {
84  case 'G':
85  phase = GAS;
86  break;
87  case 'S':
88  phase = SOLID;
89  break;
90  case 'L':
91  phase = LIQUID;
92  break;
93  default:
94  if (name.substr(name.size()-3,3) == "(L)")
95  phase = LIQUID;
96  else
97  phase = SOLID;
98  }
99 
100  // Stoichiometry
101  Species::StoichList stoich;
102  for (size_t i = 24; i < 40; i += 5) {
103  // Element name
104  std::string el = Utilities::String::trim(line.substr(i,2));
105  if (el == "") break;
106 
107  if (el == "E")
108  el = "e-";
109  else {
110  el[0] = std::toupper(el[0]);
111  el[1] = std::tolower(el[1]);
112  }
113 
114  // Number of atoms
115  int n = (int)std::atof(line.substr(i+2,3).c_str());
116  stoich(el, n);
117  }
118 
119  // Skip the next 3 lines
120  std::getline(is, line);
121  std::getline(is, line);
122  std::getline(is, line);
123 
124  return Species(name, phase, stoich);
125  }
126 
131  void loadPolynomials(
132  std::ifstream& is, std::vector<Nasa7Polynomial>& polynomials)
133  {
134  // First build a map of the species names with their indices in order
135  // to speed up the searching for needed names
136  std::map<std::string, size_t> species_names;
137  std::map<std::string, size_t>::iterator iter;
138  for (size_t i = 0; i < species().size(); ++i)
139  species_names.insert(make_pair(species()[i].name(), i));
140 
141  // Keep reading species from file until we have found all the ones we
142  // need
143  std::string line, name;
144  while (species_names.size() > 0) {
145  std::getline(is, line);
146 
147  // Do we need this species?
148  iter = species_names.find(
149  Utilities::String::trim(line.substr(0,18)));
150  if (iter == species_names.end()) {
151  // No, skip remaining lines
152  std::getline(is, line);
153  std::getline(is, line);
154  std::getline(is, line);
155  } else {
156  // Yes, load the polynomial and remove species from list
157  is.seekg(
158  -static_cast<int>(line.length()+1), std::ios_base::cur) >>
159  polynomials[iter->second];
160  species_names.erase(iter);
161  }
162  }
163  }
164 };
165 
166 // Register this database type
167 Utilities::Config::ObjectProvider<Nasa7DB, ThermoDB> nasa7DB("NASA-7");
168
